title: 5.3 Master Challenge 1
question: A company, TechSavvy creates a software program and releases it to the public under an open-source license. Another company, Techno Solutions takes the code from this open-source license program and uses it to create an exclusive software program selling it for profit. Analyze the problem and suggest preventive measures for TechSavvy to protect their product. Also, explain the laws under which TechSavvy can sue Techno Solutions.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
